text: I'm totally delighted to be able to
announce today the formation of a brand
new Accenture AWS business group which
clearly is a very serious commitment by
both of our companies to the cloud
services space so the first question is
why and my answer is simple firstly it's
better for our clients this capability
will allow us to enable a range of as a
service business models for our
customers so that they can get their
business and IT services directly from
the cloud on a consumption basis and
secondly because we believe and I know
that you all here believe truly that the
cloud is ready for primetime in the
enterprise why well our customers are
telling us also we've been working with
AWS for nearly a decade so learning as
we go and finally we have 18,000 people
already working in the cloud technology
space right now and so this means that
Accenture has a cloud first approach to
how we help our clients jump into the
range of what we believe are truly the
future of the new technologies so in
terms of the what we're doing here we're
pooling together the resources of the
winner in the cloud technology space
with a leading player in technology
services globally to put together a kind
of Cloud Sherpas for AWS so what do I
mean I mean a set of capabilities and
offerings that were born in the cloud
today our enterprise customers have got
billions of dollars locked up in their
traditional IT and the Accenture AWS
business group will allow us to help
them to fold firstly in navigating the
migration of their applications to the
cloud as well as setting up new
processes and applications in the cloud
and secondly in terms of solving very
complex big data problems in industry
specific domains using the extension
insight platform running on AWS
so clearly this means that we're making
a very considerable investment over a
multi-year period beginning with in our
first year training in incremental 1,000
people on automation methodologies and
technologies in this new cloud
environment and also we will certify 500
of them on
ws to make sure that we can help support
our clients in the journey of bringing
the full power of the innovation of the
cloud into the enterprise so clearly
today is just the first step I'm totally
stoked about it very excited we're going
to be listening to our customers very
carefully over the coming period to
learn but you can expect that beyond
cloud migration and big data analytics
will be big will be bringing a range of
other services in this space to our
customers including IOT security and
other enterprise relevant areas so with
that said thank you ever so much of
having us along Andy very excited and
for all of you enjoy the rest of
reinvent
